name: Dipper
description:
Game was made in 1,5 days for the game jam and is in the early early early version. Coming soon will be updated.

==============Faboulus===============

one day Dipper hears the voice of a bird. He tells him that he is in a coma, now you have to help Dipper get out of sleep.

=============controls=================

wsad - move

space - jump
